siteMetadata.title: Artem Demo, indie developer
siteMetadata.description: Blog about web development, indie GameDev

node.excerpt: I’m using a lot of git features via CLI. Mainly it’s rebasing, committing and pushing new changes to the repository. I know that most editors have UI solutions for these commands, but I never liked it and honestly don’t see any reason to change my habits. Stubborn you say? Probably. Don’t know.
